doc.title: Kelly in Pantyhose
doc.plot: Kelly (Jennifer Simon) is small and sweet and looks like a nice, polite young lady. But her body is filled with sexual tension and, rather than posing, she writhes sensuously on her bed, topless in a variety of pantyhose. She changes pantyhose on screen and wears sheer and extremely light control top hose. You'll love her hot, tight little ass. Lots of stocking feet also.
